item.title: After a summer of nearly’s, Football has finally come home...
item.author: Tom Hughes,
item.description: Following a run of excellent league results, RSM Football went into the big one in high spirits. It had been 14 years of pain since their last varsity victory, although on the back of a draw and narrow loss in the past two years, there were whisperings that this could be the year. The first half was …
